name: The Rising Tides of OrangePollonator
description:
Want a game featuring a evil corporation, spooked horses, gummy sharks and a chef saving the ocean that's on fire? look no further because this performer has those things

This is a gamemaker game for windows 10 and is made by many people. requires mouse and keyboard

full credits in game, but the main three devs are OceanPiggy, Moses25 and Lizzemea
